name: PlayMediaControlCommandSet
desc: A set of modifications to apply to the default set of available playback controls.

items.name: nextTrack
items.desc: Move to the next track while playing content.

items.name: previousTrack
items.desc: Move to the beginning of the current track, or to the previous track, while playing content.

items.name: skipForward
items.desc: Move forward by a number of seconds.

items.name: skipBackward
items.desc: Move backward by a number of seconds.

items.name: preferSkipForward
items.desc: Display a skip forward control in the remote UI instead of a next track control when the skipForward control is available.

items.name: preferSkipBackward
items.desc: Display a skip backward control in the remote UI instead of a next track control when the skipBackward control is available.

items.name: seekToPlaybackPosition
items.desc: Scrub to any point in the content.

items.name: dislikeTrack
items.desc: Express dislike for the current content.

items.name: bookmarkTrack
items.desc: Save the current content for later.
